last_episode_to_air.name: Rigor Mortis
last_episode_to_air.overview: Live and Reinert try to do a little good amid a whole lot of bad. Odd wrestles with a moral dilemma. Judith cranks up the heat.

name: Post Mortem: No One Dies in Skarnes
original_name: Post Mortem: Ingen d√∏r i Skarnes
overview: Live Hallangen is declared dead but hours later she suddenly wakes up with a sudden urge for blood. Meanwhile, her brother Odd tries to keep the family driven funeral home afloat.

episodes.name: Post Mortem
episodes.overview: It's just another average day in this small Norwegian town until a young woman is found dead in a field. But things are not as they seem.

episodes.name: Condolences
episodes.overview: As the police investigate another death, Live struggles to adjust to her own second chance at life as the pressure starts getting to Odd.

episodes.name: On Behalf of the Family
episodes.overview: With nowhere to run, Live hides under the bed. Reinert's blind date with Judith's niece takes an unexpected turn. Odd's business picks up.

episodes.name: A Wake
episodes.overview: As Odd puts his sales skills to the test, Live hunts for a way to dispose of evidence. Meanwhile, Judith searches for Reinert, who's gone missing.

episodes.name: Baptism by Fire
episodes.overview: Dr. Hansen offers Live an explanation of sorts. Odd gets some new business, but there's a catch. Judith begins to act on her suspicions.

episodes.name: Rigor Mortis
episodes.overview: Live and Reinert try to do a little good amid a whole lot of bad. Odd wrestles with a moral dilemma. Judith cranks up the heat.
